item.title: Welcome to Tea House
item.description: Welcome to Tea House. This blog is designed to be a peaceful sanctuary blending the philosophy of tranquility with the world of technology. Why Tea House? Tea is not just a drink; it’s a ritual of meditation. Here we will discuss: Web development with Hugo. UX Design. Philosophical and technical ideas. “Beauty lies in the simple details.” Check out this Hugo tutorial:
